hrmcalcs2oo module¶

class hrmcalcs2oo.hrmcalcs(timebeat, peak_values, start_min, end_min)¶

Bases: object

hrm_average()¶

This method is used to calculate the average heart rate over a user-specified time range involving start_min and end_min.

Returns:This method returns the average heart rate

over the user-defined range of minutes.

hrm_instant()¶

This method calculates the instant heart rate values from timebeat, the time occurrence of each heartbeat.

Returns:This method returns a stored vector of instantaneous heart

rate values.

Heart Rate Monitor
